mapper.select: select main.code mainCode, main.code_name mainCodeName, sub.code subCode, sub.code_name subCodeName from box_action_main main,box_action_sub sub where main.code=sub.main_code
select main.code mainCode, main.code_name mainCodeName, sub.code subCode, sub.code_name subCodeName from box_action_main main,box_action_sub sub where main.code=sub.main_code and main.code=1
